title: Vice President Biden Hosts Conference Calls With Governors And Local Officials To Discuss Recovery Act Implementation 4/21 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




April 21, 2009

 



Vice President Biden Hosts Conference Calls With Governors And Local Officials To Discuss Recovery Act Implementation 4/21




THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Vice President ______________________________________________________ FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE           April 21, 2009   VICE PRESIDENT BIDEN HOSTS CONFERENCE CALLS WITH GOVERNORS AND LOCAL OFFICIALS TO DISCUSS RECOVERY ACT IMPLEMENTATION Earlier today, the Vice President hosted two conference calls with Governors and Mayors/County Executives from across the country to discuss Recovery Act implementation. The following elected officials participated: GOVERNORS          Governor Phil Bredesen (D-TN)         Governor Jan Brewer (R-AZ)         Governor Luis G. Fortuño (R-PR)         Governor Jim Gibbons (R-NV)         Governor Jack Markell (D-DE)         Governor Brian Schweitzer (D-MT)  MAYORS / COUNTIES          Mayor Tom Barrett (D – Milwaukee, WI)         Mayor Kathy Novak (R – Northglenn, CO)         Mayor Joe Reardon (D – Kansas City, KS)         Mayor Scott Smith (R – Mesa, AZ)         Mayor Kathy Taylor (D – Tulsa, OK)         County Commissioner George Madlaras (D – Strafford County, NH)         County Executive Andrew Spano (D – West Chester County, NY)  ###
